messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] the history of the samrai
messages.msgSnippet: Start with a book. You re not going to learn nearly enough to do what you want simply by asking people on this list. If you go to the samurai archives site
messages.messageBody:
Start with a book. You're not going to learn nearly
enough to do what you want simply by asking people on
this list. If you go to the samurai archives site
(www.samurai-archives.com), there is an excellent
bibliography on there. Start with one of those books.
ANY OF THEM. Please.

Nate

--- Joe <gunblade007@...> wrote:
> hello i'm Joe. i'm interest in learning more about

> samurai and a chinese warrior. and they have many
> adventures

> did the english
> came. was there samurais back in the chinese dynasty
> days? thank you
> for your time.
> -Joe:)
>
>

messages.messageBody:
hello i'm Joe. i'm interest in learning more about samurais in old
japan.i'm thinking about writing a story about a english man and a
samurai and a chinese warrior. and they have many adventures
together. but i need to learn about japan. like when did the english
came. was there samurais back in the chinese dynasty days? thank you
for your time.
-Joe:)
